'''Henrik Kniberg''' is a former coach and game developer at [[Mojang Studios]] who worked on ''Minecraft: Java Edition''. He was announced as a new team member on March 29, 2019.<ref>{{tweet|Marc_IRL|1111711226487291904|New dev alert! Give @henrikkniberg a follow. You might learn some things! He came to Mojang as a coach and has apparently just pulled up a chair and started fixing things in Minecraft. üòâ|March 29, 2019}}</ref>

On October 14, 2019, [[Agnes Larsson]] announced that Henrik has joined the ''Minecraft'' Gameplay team<ref>{{tweet|_LadyAgnes|1183685357809913856|I'm happy to announce @henrikkniberg as a new team member in the Minecraft Gameplay team! Send him a hug or just some random Minecraft thoughts ;). Henrik has been at Mojang for awhile and has helped us with lots of things, so it is truly lovely he now is a part of our team.|14 Oct 2019}}</ref> and obtained an official team member status.<ref>{{tweet|Cojomax99|1183684191390781440|Super excited about this becoming official! Henrik has been helping out for a while now and is really excited about getting to know the community and contribute to the game. Please give him your warmest welcome :)|14 Oct 2019}}</ref>

Henrik announced his departure from Mojang on May 31, 2022.<ref>{{tweet|henrikkniberg|1531576252775161858|Hi folks, I'm leaving Mojang, at least for now, so I won't be posting as much Minecraft stuff. This has been really fun! Never met a dev team with so strong passion for their product & users. And the community has been super helpful with snapshot feedback & testing. Keep it up!‚ù§Ô∏è|31 May 2022}}</ref>

==Biography==
Henrik Kniberg is an organizational consultant and developer at Crisp in Stockholm. He does coaching and did ''Minecraft'' development at Mojang, and has previously worked at Lego and Spotify. He enjoys helping companies succeed with both the technical and human sides of product development using agile and lean principles, as described in his popular books ‚ÄúScrum and XP from the Trenches‚Äù and ‚ÄúKanban and Scrum, making the most of both‚Äù and ‚ÄúLean from the Trenches‚Äú, as well as his viral videos ‚ÄúAgile Product Ownership in a Nutshell‚Äù and ‚ÄúSpotify Engineering Culture‚Äú. Henrik is also engaged in climate change; he created the video "Friendly Guide to Climate Change" and is involved with GoClimateNeutral, Trine, and other startups in that space.<ref>https://www.crisp.se/konsulter/henrik-kniberg/bio</ref>
